properties.areaDesc: Lawrence, IL; Crawford, IL; Knox, IN; Sullivan, IN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 28 at 7:32AM EST until January 29 at 11:16AM EST by NWS Indianapolis IN
properties.description:
...A Flood Warning continues for a small portion of the following
waterway in Indiana...

Wabash River...

.The Wabash River at Riverton in southwest Indiana remains in flood,
but is expected to drop below flood stage tonight.  The river will
fall for the foreseeable future.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Wabash River at Riverton.
* until Wednesday morning.
* At 7:00 AM Tuesday the stage was 15.7 feet.
* Flood stage is 15.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...It will continue to fall to below flood stage by this
evening.
* At 16.0 feet...Some agricultural lands underwater.  A few rural
roads in Crawford County, Illinois close as water backs up Minnow
Slough.  High water affects campground at Leaverton Park in
Palestine.  A few private roads near the Gill Township levee in
Sullivan County may flood.  Water level is at the top of most
makeshift levees.
properties.instruction:
Precautionary/Preparedness Actions...

Motorists should never drive into flood water. Turn around and go
another way. Keep children away from flooded areas. Recreational and
agricultural interests should remain alert to changing river
conditions.

For detailed flood information go to weather.gov/ind on the web and
click on rivers and lakes.
